name: Zulucrypt
tagline: zuluCrypt is a front end to cryptsetup and tcplay and it allows easy management of encrypted block devices
body: ## zuluCrypt zuluCrypt is a front end to cryptsetup and tcplay and it is a tool that make it easy to manage luks,plain dm-crypt,TrueCrypt? and VeraCrypt? volumes through a GUI and a simpler to use CLI interface. zuluCrypt can manage encrypted volumes residing in regular files,LVM and mdraid devices as well as regular block devices and partitions. ## zuluMount zuluMount is a front end to zuluCrypt and its meant to be used as a general purpose tool that mount and unmount zuluCrypt supported encrypted volumes as well as unencrypted volumes and it can be used as a substitute to udisks,pmount and related tools. zuluMount-gui can also be used as a frontend to encfs.. Just drag and drop encfs encrypted folder on zuluMount-gui to unlock it. zuluMount-gui is ideal for use as a desktop environment/file manager independent tool for mounting/unmounting encrypted and unencrypted volumes. Some options of zuluMount-gui are set through its tray icon,if you are on a GNOME3 desktop,you can access those options through GNOME3 extension like topicons. ## screen shots screenshots are at the end of this page. ## video reviews click this link to see a youtube video showing some features of zuluCrypt ## zuluCrypt download page latest released version is 4.7.5 and it can be downloaded by clicking one of the two below links. zuluCrypt-4.7.5.tar.bz2 zuluCrypt-4.7.5.tar.xz Older versions can be downloaded from here. ## binary packages binary packages for some distributions are here. ps: xUbuntu packages should work with debian and all flavors of ubuntu.
